column5: i did 375 of both
oh i wish i could send you a picture of my back it was like bubbly where i was itching it, i’ve mixed it tho it makes the dph way more intense and the body high of the dxm
😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂drain is the shit bro
me too
be careful
that makes perfect sense
i don’t understand what you mean, if you mean people taking like one or 2 then it’s for the robo itch
i mean that’s the joke, like i made this meme myself, dxm youre in a dark cloudy depressing place. dxm you’re really hot and you feel really good
the drug in benadryl, a deliriant
put a pill in a mcflurry i’m goofy
yup

i got it when i did it with people but it never ever scared me, i know i’m on a drug so i don’t have a bad experience like i know it’s all probably fake while i’m tripping on it surprisingly given that it’s a deliriant, the whole trip felt synthetic and made perfect sense to me every time it was so weird but the feeling made me feel like i had been there millions of times before, like a place in my mind i can’t get to when i’m sober

trust me i know this, i take lots of precautions when doing drugs especially drugs like dph which i don’t even do anymore, it never effected me that way at all because i never took a huge huge dose but i remember hearing of some kid who did 4 grams and said he was stuck in a white space and he could hear nothing but screaming and felt like there was a hot coal between his ears, he also said the period of time he spent there felt longer than his life

i did about 375 of both and i saw the phantoms you were talking about but there was only one at a time. there was a guy who was searching through my movie case by my tv and he was stealing movies and he had a gun but it all seemed like a dream and then i blinked and i was on my couch with my friend. i saw a tiger too and it was blue, when i smoked on my afterglow i saw weird trip walls in the middle of my friends room and that were gassy and see through but it looked so real
i love the afterglow of dph it’s so warm and comfortable, how many mf
dxm or dph?😂

it’s almost too overwhelming to stand, i was sitting almost the whole time but the trip was so intense it didn’t even make a difference if i was walking around or sitting, i did see a dark blue tiger it just walked up to me and walked away, but i don’t remember the body high too much i just remember telling my friend about it if you know what mean, it was so heavy and i could barely stand up tho
i did 500 the first time i’d ever tried dph, have you ever mixed them thoooooo, basically more body load on the dxm end but the dph visuals are increased a fucking shit ton
i am a male
i have had my fair share of trips, from both
crazy shit😂
lmfao
drug in benadryl
lmao it’s a bit of both

i went through a hard break up about 6 months ago, and yea the sadness felt addicting, i would be so sad for so long i would start to feel nothing, nothing at all, no emotion but stress in my head, i became very defiant towards my family and it felt great, i was leaving school all the time and skipping class, leaving my house to go smoke blunts in my friends car who i would give cbd weed so they thought i was smoking them up, putting on a fake smile and act, i was playing everyone in my life because of one tragic thing, it’s because i wanted something bad to happen so i could have the best excuse to kill myself, but now i don’t want to die anymore.
has to be cap, it’s not true

for me weed got stronger on my body than it used to be but for me i can’t get lost enough, i still think like the same i do when i’m sober other then jumping to conclusions really fast which drugs tend to do

i actually did 3 grams and walked into my room and it seemed much taller and everything was weirdly twinkly and green and i felt much shorter and i felt like i was an elf, my body shape felt disproportionate and long and my legs felt really  really short and i’m 6’1. it felt like i was in a weird old fantasy world where you would stumble upon a hut made out of a tree or a huge ass fruit with a small door
because after peep died wicca is the best gbc member
makes a lot more sense lmao, i’m a huge druggie and still haven’t lost my spelling touch
i did 180 of really good quality seeds and the nausea was still very strong, it’s like on the verge of puking but you know you probably won’t
i love that so much
what do you mean more sure? like they’re more than likely treated with something? if they’re treated you could be eating 10 grams of chemicals
my mom coincidentally put that decoration right behind the arm rest

i’m 16 i took 180 and i was ripping my friends cart and everything was like a mixture of frame by frame high and tracers and when i would look at the wall it looked like i was looking into a red plain much bigger than the room i was in and there was a ton of white dots spinning in it, i felt like i was about to have a seizure but it lasted about 2 hours and after the first like 5 minutes i realized it was part of the trip then i was having a good trip again
yea me too
yea you’re okay bro, is like an afterglow?
yea i really don’t see how nobody is getting this it’s literally a joke

a few months ago my friend who’s 16 did 700 and saw one spider on his hand and he felt like shit the rest of the night from the body load and the other negative effects that come when you don’t trip, he has done way lower doses and has had way more of an affect, for me i get visuals and shadow people from any dose over like 300 because it hits me different, but yea it all depends on the day and the person it’s really weird, i’m surprised you didn’t know but some days it just doesn’t work

thank you man, you too. i also has a girlfriend that was first my best friend. we were best friends for 2 months and then we started dating, i met her when i was microfossils candy flipping and she just hit me different and we just clicked and we planned a simple future together and she betrayed me and we broke up because she wasn’t feeling it anymore and afterwards treated me like shit and acted like i was too clingy and i was nothing but nice and supportive and caring and we were very in love. she came over to fuck me and would fuck with my head and play me and curve me for no reason after that and for me too it also changed my whole perspective on life and i get weird beautiful imagery when i think about the feeling she gave me. that was 6 months ago and we have completely found peace with each other but she affected my mental health in a way no one ever had and i’ve never been the same since, if you genuinely want to know more i have a song called “i hate u now” on soundcloud, this had nothing to do with the mushrooms at all but also hppd from lsd made it harder for me to talk to her at first and get used to her and the way she made me feel terrible made it so much worse and i just have this feeling in my chest of unknown emotion  every single day and it’s so fucking hard.

thank you man, you too. i also has a girlfriend that was first my best friend. we were best friends for 2 months and then we started dating, i met her when i was microfossils candy flipping and she just hit me different and we just clicked and we planned a simple future together and she betrayed me and we broke up because she wasn’t feeling it anymore and afterwards treated me like shit and acted like i was too clingy and i was nothing but nice and supportive and caring and we were very in love. she came over to fuck me and would fuck with my head and play me and curve me for no reason after that and for me too it also changed my whole perspective on life and i get weird beautiful imagery when i think about the feeling she gave me. that was 6 months ago and we have completely found peace with each other but she affected my mental health in a way no one ever had and i’ve never been the same since, if you genuinely want to know more i have a song called “i hate u now” on soundcloud, this had nothing to do with the mushrooms at all but also hppd from lsd made it harder for me to talk to her at first and get used to her and the way she made me feel terrible made it so much worse and i just have this feeling in my chest of unknown emotion  every single day and it’s so fucking hard.

thank you. whenever i get a feeling of hopelessness i make beats and i write music and i put it on soundcloud, my soundcloud name is Mary J if you ever want to listen, i have been smoking cigs less when my friends go out to smoke i stay inside every other time, trying to quit cigarettes at the same time adds on to the stress a lot, and i have had a lot of girls this year come and go and it makes it easier to write music because how sad i am, the hppd affecting how i talk to girls in person, they all give me this same weird look, or most of them at least, and it’s hard for them to stay by my side and i don’t know why because i’m so genuine to them and i treat them very well because i get very attached and don’t want to lose them, and i get absolutely no music attention either so that adds onto the stress, i just want to feel like a normal guy again because girls and people make my hppd worse by acting like i’m weird

i see, i’m not going to say my age but i am young and i am very addicted to cigarettes and have a very strong dependency for weed the longest i’ve gone in the last year without smoking was 8 days, and i’m young and i’m dumb and i feel like i’m just looking for other drugs to cure it or make it better but every drug i do feels different know even hydros were weird for me, almost all drugs are ruined for me like dxm or acid, and i’ve done dph a few times too, i’m just looking for the right compound, ssri’s give me anxiety, xanax has been the only thing that took that certain impending doom feeling away from me

it was already too late, i did acid around 20 times in 2-3 months and i already had hppd and derealization before it because of a trip i had on lsd where i wasn’t anyone and i was a happy lil being it was the strongest who death i’ve ever had but it was traumatizing afterwards and i didn’t know it was hppd because i didn’t know what it was but i somehow assumed all the little patterns would go away but then i fucked that up over the summer when i doses over 20 times
what do you mean?
the guy that did 4000mg said it felt like there was a hot coal burning between his ears in his brain
bladee or ecco2k are very strange during a doh trip and sometimes they start rapping random verses but it’s just part of the hallucination, just wanted to put that out there
legs glitching everywhere on every flat surface
i ran from a black cloud man and there was 2 circles on my hands that looked like little bugs but they were small dots spinning in a perfect circle on the back of my hands

dph trips aren’t really supposed to be fun or produce any euphoria my guy. for that reason i know exactly what you mean when you can’t see people doing it regularly. but taking a higher amount will not increase the “fun” or euphoria in any way and may put you in a darker place if you’re not expecting that dark almost satanic place and vibe you get on dph.
really though😂

yes i know that. that’s why i stopped with pills but i never really did any pills over 3 times and i talk to my mom and she sees how much i am suffering and it breaks her heart and most people i talk to just feel the same and have the same words to exchange as i do so it’s really hard to find the right person but my girl has been keeping me happy i’ve been through about 7 therapists and they all were bad
weed does not feel the same

yea i fucked with like 12 different drugs this summer alone when i was 15 and i can’t find joy or happiness in anything. it’s all too boring and living itself is just stress. even having my girlfriend doesn’t make it any better. she does for the time she is with me but it’s still there but she helps a lot when she is around. and she was just taken by the police from my house last night and i am now going insane. HPPD in completely incurable, i’ve tried atarax, hydros, xanax, they don’t help, xanax takes away the annoying feeling and replaces it with nothing and it’s almost a calming emptiness. DXM is almost ruined for me.

i completely feel that. i never took 800 my biggest dose is around 550 and i was also on and off sleeping and never had any effects because i was so tired. i also have static like vision and everything feels like a dream. this is HPPD and i believe we both have it. everytime i do DPH the static gets stronger especially mixed with dxm. i want to be a kid again i’m only 16 and i want to fucking die because there is no joy in life after seeing all of this.
